Description.Text: The 4-star Dylan Apartments Paddington offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in London. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Dylan Apartments Paddington. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with non smoking rooms, heating, desk, telephone, fan. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Dylan Apartments Paddington combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in London unforgettable.
